summary: During his summer vacation on Nantucket Island in 1942, a youth eagerly awaiting his first sexual encounter finds himself developing an innocent love for a young woman awaiting news on her soldier husband's fate in WWII.
cast: Jennifer O'Neill|Gary Grimes|Jerry Houser|Oliver Conant|Katherine Allentuck|Christopher Norris|Lou Frizzell|Robert Mulligan|Walter Scott|Maureen Stapleton
keywords: summer vacation|teen angst|coming of age|world war two|obsession
title: Verano del 42
